name: cs-ast-extester
description: Sample eXTester project for VS Code extension testing

scripts.test: npm run prepare:vscode && npm run build && node ./scripts/install-codescene-extension.js && node ./scripts/prepare-settings-with-token.js && node ./scripts/run-extest.js
scripts.test:insiders: npm run prepare:vscode && npm run build && node ./scripts/install-codescene-extension.js && node ./scripts/prepare-settings-with-token.js && node ./scripts/run-extest.js --type insider --code_version max
scripts.report:merge: rimraf reports/mochawesome/merged.json reports/mochawesome/report.html && mochawesome-merge "reports/mochawesome/report*.json" > reports/mochawesome/merged.json && marge reports/mochawesome/merged.json --reportDir reports/mochawesome --reportFilename report
